page.title: 04FARMS IN OGWELL & DENBURY
page.content: We sent out a questionaire to 16 farmers living in the area.1 farmer we contacted had lived there for over 60 years,others for only for 5 years. Some farmers have got 4 or 5 tractors of their own. Farms vary in size from 30 acres to{300}acres. 6 farmers had cut down some hedges,13 had streams running through their land and 9 had drained some it. 11 farmers had beef cattle 8 had dairy cows but only{1}had a bull,8 had sheep 6 kept pigs,2 had horses and 7 had poultry. Most had dogs.In our area these are the crops that are grown:grass,barley,rye,oats, turnips,fodder beat,mangold,wheat, potatoes,swedes,apples,soft fruit, cabbage and kale. by {Darren Salmons & Shaun Marshall {aged 10 {
